title: BSC testnet doesn't sync with 2022.09.03.
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `./erigon --version`
2022.09.3-dev-2c1d617b

OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX
Ubuntu Server 22.04 LTS (arm64)

Commit hash : 2c1d617b

#### Expected behaviour


#### Actual behaviour
New commit (for v2022.09.03) didn't help for this issue (https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/issues/5418).
It continuously is trying to download somethings (as shown in log), but no disk usage found.
It's not an newly started node, it had been used well before 1 week ago.

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour


#### Backtrace


Can you show the full log?

run `./build/bin/integration state_stages --unwind=1000 --datadir=/your/datadir --chain=your-chain` you essentially have to unwind until before your bad block hash to make sure the commit from issue #5418 actually works
This issue is stale because it has been open for 40 days with no activity. Remove stale label or comment, or this will be closed in 7 days.
This issue was closed because it has been stalled for 7 days with no activity.
